item.title: Nintendo DS Reverse Engineering
item.author: my.toe.ben@gmail.com (Jason Duong)
item.description: I do not support piracy. What I provide in this article is entirely for educational purposes only. Intro My first gaming console was the Nintendo DS, and one of my nostalgic games, besides Pokémon, was Spectrobes - Beyond the Portal. The game features similar mechanics to Pokémon, with a collection of spectrobes. What differentiates them is their combat system. Pokémon is turn-based, while Spectrobes - Beyond the Portal is third-person.
